additional_activities.label: Q9.  If no leaks were found, please describe any events or activities that may have contributed to the plume observed on the date provided in Section 2.

emission_cause.label: Q16.  Please select the most likely cause of the leak.

emission_cause_notes.label: Q19.  Please provide a more detailed description of the cause(s), including the reason for and duration of any construction activity or downtime.

emission_cause_secondary.label: Q17 (Optional).  Please select an alternative cause (only if suspected).  This should not be the same as your Q16 response.

emission_cause_tertiary.label: Q18 (Optional).  Please select an alternative cause (only if suspected).  This should not be the same as your Q16 or Q17 responses.

emission_identified_flag_fk.label: Q8.  Was a leak identified through prior knowledge or by follow-up monitoring after receipt of a CARB plume notice?

emission_location.label: Q14.  Please select from the drop-down menu which option best describes the location of the leak.

emission_location_notes.label: Q15.  Please provide a more detailed description of the leak location, including grid ID number or component name, if applicable.

emission_type_fk.label: Q13:  Please select from the drop-down menu which option best matches the description of the leak.

included_in_last_lmr.label: Q24.  Was the leak location monitored in the most recent prior quarterly/annual surface emissions or quarterly component leak monitoring event?

included_in_last_lmr_description.label: Q25.  If 'No' to Q24, please explain why the area was excluded from monitoring.

initial_leak_concentration.label: Q10:  Maximum concentration of methane leak (in ppmv).

inspection_timestamp.label: Q6.  Date of owner/operator's follow-up ground monitoring.

instrument.label: Q7.  Instrument used to locate the leak (e.g., Fisher Scientific TVA2020; RKI Multigas Analyzer Eagle 2; TDL).

last_component_leak_monitoring_timestamp.label: Q29.  Date of most recent component leak monitoring event (prior to this notification).

last_surface_monitoring_timestamp.label: Q28.  Date of most recent surface emissions monitoring event (prior to this notification).

lat_revised.label: Q11.  Please provide a revised latitude if the leak location differs from CARB's estimate in Section 2.

long_revised.label: Q12.  Please provide a revised longitude if the leak location differs from CARB's estimate in Section 2.

mitigation_actions.label: Q20.  Describe any corrective actions taken.

planned_for_next_lmr.label: Q26.  Is this grid/component planned for inclusion in the next quarterly/annual leak monitoring?

planned_for_next_lmr_description.label: Q27.  If 'No' to Q26, please state why the area will not be monitored.

re_monitored_concentration.label: Q23.  Re-monitored methane concentration after repair (ppmv).
